text: why would one use AWS instead of VPS like this one? <https://www.tradingservers.co.uk/?language=english>

attachments.title: Trading Servers ~ fast low latency remote access to Betfair and Betdaq
attachments.text: VPS with a 24/7 ultra fast, low latency connections to both the Betfair and Betdaq exchanges. Use your trading platform from anywhere with an internet connection

text: Often I feel speed as advertised seems to be confused with bandwidth. Bandwidth is not the issue, but latency and variance in latency are key.

text: to measure marketstream latency I simply compare the publishTime on incoming messages with the current time (time.time()).

text: one should expect roughly half the ping time for this. i.e. if ping time is 15ms, you should expect around 7.5ms one-way for marketstream.
